registeredEmail.subject: The Middle Sweepstakes
registeredEmail.body:
Thanks for registering for THE MIDDLE ULTIMATE FAN GIVEAWAY SWEEPSTAKES. The Middle now airs locally twice a night, five times a week! You can enter twice each weeknight from May 21st to June 1st.
For Support during the Sweepstakes please contact support@themiddleweeknights.com
http://www.themiddleweeknights.com/sweepstakes/
